subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Spain, winner of the Davis Cup, is not as deep as it was several years ago when it had a handful of Grand Slam champions and finalists on its roster, but its depth of tennis talent is impressive.
snippet: Spain, winner of the Davis Cup, is not as deep as it was several years ago when it had a handful of Grand Slam champions and finalists on its roster, but its depth of tennis talent is impressive.
